title: EndOfDay

tenantId.description: The tenant id for the end of day event

correlationId.description: The correlation id for the end of day event

businessUnitId.description: The business unit id for the end of day event

userId.description: The user id of the user submitting the end of day event.

externalUserId.description: The external user id of the user submitting the end of day event.

endOfDayDate.description: The date (not time) this end of day applies to.

comment.description: The comment by the user that performed the end of day submit

timestamp.description: The timestamp for the end of day event

reconciliationIds.description: List of all reconciliation id's included in this end of day event.

tenders.description: Accumulated values for all tenders in all included reconciliations for this end of day event.

items.description: Accumulated values for all items in all included reconciliations for this end of day event.

expectedAmount.description: The expected amount for the tender, i.e. the system accumulated amount based on all reconciliations for this end of day event.

actualAmount.description: The actual amount counted for the tender.

actualAmountDelta.description: The change in the actual amount counted for the tender compared to the previous amount.

deviationAmount.description: The deviation between counted and expected amount. If negative, it means that counted is less than expected

expectedQuantity.description: The expected quantity for the tender, i.e. the system accumulated quantity based on all transactions performed.

actualQuantityDelta.description: The change in the actual quantity counted for the tender compared to the previous count.

deviationQuantity.description: The deviation between counted and expected quantity. If negative, it means that counted is less than expected

reconciliationMethod.description: If AUTOMATIC then item is read only, if MANUAL then item is not read only

expectedAmount.description: The expected amount accumulated for the item.

actualAmount.description: The actual amount counted for the item.

actualAmountDelta.description: The change in the actual amount counted for the item compared to the previous amount.

deviationAmount.description: The deviation between counted and expected amount. If negative, it means that counted is less than expected

expectedQuantity.description: The expected quantity for the item, i.e. the system accumulated quantity based on all transactions performed.

actualQuantity.description: The actual amount for the item.

actualQuantityDelta.description: The change in the actual quantity counted for the item compared to the previous count.

deviationQuantity.description: The deviation between counted and expected quantity. If negative, it means that counted is less than expected
